footnotes: Rung on the lightest minor 3 in the tower to celebrate the repair of the spider by the Steeple Keeper, Tower Captain, and Deputy Tower Captain, as is YCG tradition.
Also rung to welcome in the New Year.
First participation in jointly conducting for all.
First YCG Quarter of the Year.
First Quarter on the bells this year.
First Quarter of Original this year.
First Quarter of Singles this year.
First quarter with no method mistakes: 2
The band would like to associate David Denbigh's drill with this performance.
"This was a bad idea" - Nat at extent 45
